description: Order management system with complex business logic
features: Business rule: Calculate subtotal = sum(item.price * item.quantity)
Business rule: Apply 10% discount if subtotal > $100 AND customer.isPremium = true
Business rule: Apply 5% discount if subtotal > $200
Business rule: Calculate total = subtotal - discount + tax
Business rule: Return 400 if insufficient inventory
objectives: Test error handling for business rule violations
